channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rails launches perps-only crypto exchange in the U.S. with $14 million in new funding to build a better FTX
item.description: Rails is backed by Sam Lessin’s Slow Ventures and cofounded by the former Grindr COO.

item.title: Exclusive: Vivrelle raises $62 million to expand its service renting handbags from Prada and Chanel as part of a luxury ‘lifestyle’
item.description: The startup is part of the next generation of rental services.

item.title: Dollar Tree releases Q2 forecast showing impacts from changing tariffs
item.description: Discount store operator Dollar Tree forecast its second-quarter adjusted profit to be down as much as 50% from a year ago, accounting for volatility c...

item.title: How to Craft a Memorable Employee Experience to Keep Good Workers From Quitting
item.description: The way to fix low employee engagement is to create the right experience for your workers.

item.title: Joby Aviation stock keeps rising on news that it will ‘explore opportunities’ to supply flying taxis to Saudi Arabia
item.description: Shares in Joby Aviation (NYSE: JOBY) jumped yesterday after the air taxi company announced a potential deal with the Saudi Arabia-based Abdul Latif Ja...

item.title: Campbell’s says soup sales are soaring—and that’s actually a sign the U.S. economy is in a downturn, data shows
item.description: More people are cooking at home since early 2020.

item.title: Meta Goes Nuclear to Fuel Its Massive AI Ambitions
item.description: Big Tech’s AI obsession is a tailwind for nuclear energy.

item.title: Mark Cuban and Anthropic’s CEO Are Arguing About How Many Jobs AI Will Replace
item.description: Mark Cuban and Dario Amodei are battling it out about AI job losses. It’s a reminder that when it comes to AI, no one is sure about anything.

item.title: Trump’s 50% tariffs on steel and aluminum are imminent. Here’s what to know
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has promised to hike nearly all of his tariffs on foreign steel and aluminum to a punishing 50% on Wednesday, a move that ...

item.title: This plant compound could lower your risk of heart disease and diabetes, according to new research
item.description: A new study is among the first to show the benefits of phytosterols as part of a regular diet.

item.title: Germany unveils €45.8 billion in corporate tax breaks to supercharge stagnant economy
item.description: Under the plans, Germany's corporate tax rate would fall by one percent a year from 2028 to reach 10 percent, down from 15 percent.

item.title: TikTok bans the #SkinnyTok hashtag for unhealthy weight-loss content. Will it actually solve the problem?
item.description: TikTok, a platform where misinformation and dangerous rhetoric often spreads far and wide, has officially removed the #SkinnyTok hashtag from its sear...

item.title: AI Slop Is Winning Because It’s the Future
item.description: Or: ‘Andor’ is the best thing ever made for television and no one cares.

item.title: Canada’s wildfire smoke has reached Europe, while causing ‘very unhealthy’ conditions in U.S.
item.description: Smoke from Canadian wildfires carried another day of poor air quality south of the border to the Midwest, where conditions in parts of Minnesota, Wisc...

item.title: Life Without a Title: When a CEO Retires
U.S. economy’s services sector shrinks for the first time in nearly a year
Trump again calls on Fed’s Powell to lower rates after weak job-creation data
